metadata.synopsis: The 19th-century English explorer Sir Richard Burton (John Robinson) meets the ghost of the first AIDS patient (Normand Fauteux), in Toronto.
metadata.genre: Art House & International/Drama/Musical & Performing Arts/Science Fiction & Fantasy/Gay & Lesbian

reviews: Its heart is in the right place. Its art, unfortunately, is not.
Amid the farce there are moments of lucidity and informative dialog that's both telling and historically important.
